title: Heat Shock Transformation
author: Opentrons
description: Perform a 1 minute heat shock transformation on six samples.
process:
Add DNA to competent cells.
Incubate on ice for 30 minutes.
Heat shock cells/DNA for 1 minute.
Incubate on ice for 5 minutes.
Add LB to cells/DNA.
preview: Use our HeatDeck and CoolDeck to perform a 1 minute heat shock transformation on six samples.

markdown.title: Heat Shock Transformation
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: Perform a 1 minute heat shock transformation on six samples.
markdown.process:
1. Add DNA to competent cells.
2. Incubate on ice for 30 minutes.
3. Heat shock cells/DNA for 1 minute.
4. Incubate on ice for 5 minutes.
5. Add LB to cells/DNA.
markdown.preview: Use our HeatDeck and CoolDeck to perform a 1 minute heat shock transformation on six samples.
